sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ActivitySubscriptionContext</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Gets installed as part of "com.snc.activity_subscriptions" plugin Activity Subscriptions Framework.
A wrapper class to get access to service layer components for Activity Subscriptions.</description>
        <name>ActivitySubscriptionContext</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ActivitySubscriptionContext = Class.create();
ActivitySubscriptionContext.prototype = Object.extendsObject(ActivitySubscriptionContextImpl, {
	getCommSubscriptionDAO: function(){
		return new sn_communities.CommSubscriptionDAO(this);
	},
    type: 'ActivitySubscriptionContext'
});
ActivitySubscriptionContext.getContext = function() {
	return new ActivitySubscriptionContext();
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-01-06 00:29:32</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>772356c3db003200fa9b32d8f0b8f526</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>28</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ActivitySubscriptionContext</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Subscriptions and Activity Feed Framework" source="com.snc.activity_subscriptions">7427f20f2f400110d8a4d5f62799b6eb</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_772356c3db003200fa9b32d8f0b8f526</sys_update_name>
